title: Fabulous One Bed / One Bath Fast Approver
description:
Delaware River near the Pennsylvania-New Jersey state line, the historic city of Philadelphia played a major role in the fight for independence, even serving as the nation’s capital for a brief period. Today, Philly’s rich history blends seamlessly with its modern, progressive spirit, forming a one-of-a-kind urban experience. As one of the nation’s largest cities, you’ll discover a variety of bustling businesses, such as the Philadelphia Stock Exchange, the country’s oldest stock exchange.
The University of Pennsylvania, the Philadelphia International Airport, and a multitude of historical landmarks and tourist attractions reside in this urban oasis. Admire the historic Liberty Bell, explore the Philadelphia Museum of Art, and take a trip to the famous Philadelphia Zoo. Enjoy the waterfront at Franklin D. Roosevelt Park, snap a picture at the Magic Gardens, or soak in the unique identities of the varied neighborhoods of the city.

title: Fabulous Light-filled, south facing corner unit in Ellington Buildin
description:
Welcome to Unit 15A in the fabulous Ellington building! Unit 15A is a light-filled, south facing corner unit in one of the more spacious layouts of the building. High up on the 15th floor, you have views of South Philadelphia as well as the iconic Comcast building! High ceilings and oversized windows make for a comfortable living & dining space.
The primary bedroom is complete with an en-suite bathroom. Stackable washer/dryer is located right off the kitchen. The Ellington is a secure, convenient building with a 24-hour concierge, fitness center, meeting & party rooms, and a library. Several parking garages with monthly options are within a block of the front door. No pets. First, last, and security deposit due prior to move-in. $300 non-refundable move-in fee required by the building. All utilities included except cable/internet.
The kitchen has plenty of cabinet and counter space plus stainless steel appliances. Storage is not an issue in this unit - the hall is lined with deep closets for all of your belongings and both bedrooms have ample closet space.
Central A/C

This is corner lot and enjoy a leisurely stroll on the walking paths along the riverfront. Located within minutes to some of the finest restaurants and hot spots of Fishtown. The interior unit that offers the perfect open concept floorplan. The 9' first and second-floor ceilings add to the appeal and grandeur of this townhome. The kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances has a generously sized island and leads to the living room and casual dining room lending itself perfectly for either a night of entertaining or relaxing. A spacious primary bedroom features an elegant tray ceiling and a covered deck. The Primary bath includes a dual-sink vanity, seated shower, separate water closet, and leads to a large walk-in closet. Two additional bedrooms on the 3rd level can be used for a home office or guest suite. Park your car in this attached, single car, rear entry garage. Overflow street parking is also available for you and your guests. Pictures from the model home.

title: Studio Apt Home with Wood Floors and City Skyline View, Guest Suites
description:
The studio apartment home at 2307 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 23rd floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as November 24, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, and Aldi. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, Monks' Cafe, and Marathon on the Square. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and J'aime French Café. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro from El Merkury! Relax with a manicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: SPECTACULAR 3 BED, 2 BATH HOME ON A TREE-LINED STREET IN FITLER SQUARE
description:
Spectacular 3 Bed, 2 Bath home on a tree lined street in Fitler Square and the GREENFIELD CATCHMENT!!!! Enter through the chic black and white brick exterior and find a freshly painted first floor highlighted by hardwood floors, an exposed brick wall and multiple windows which fill the rooms with an abundance of natural light. A two-story ceiling gives the Living Room a sense of airiness while the space maintains a cozy ambiance thanks to its brick fireplace. The Dining Room is a charming space that is well lit from warm track lighting beneath exposed beams. Walk into the kitchen and you will find plenty of cabinetry, a gas stove top and granite countertops that provide ample working space. Next to the Kitchen is a charming small Patio that is perfect for dining al fresco. Ascend the Living Room stairs to find the second floor complete with a Full Bath and a Primary Bedroom that provides ample closet space, ceiling fan and hardwood floors throughout. Two more Bedrooms and a Full Bath can be found on the third floor. The Fully Finished Basement is the perfect place to entertain guests for a football game or an enjoyable place to watch tv while folding laundry (also located in the Basement). A stoneâ€™s throw away from I-76, the Schuylkill River walk and many local shops and restaurants, 515 S 27th St. is no to be missed!
515 S 27th St

title: The Best Location in Rittenhouse Square is Available to Rent!!
description:
Half a block way from Rittenhouse Square Park. Roof top deck with spectacular view of the park as seen in the photos. This rental has two generously size bedrooms (11x11 and 19x8) with two full bathrooms. A garden walkway welcomes you as you enter the property through a private gated entrance. The updated kitchen boasts granite counter tops, newer stainless steel appliances and a charming back splash. The second level offers a full bath with subway tiles and pedestal sink as well as a large bedroom (19x8) with more than ample closet space and built-in shelving - this level has plenty of natural light shining through the windows. The third level features a nicely updated full bathroom with an 11x11 bedroom and plenty of natural light. The lower level has a nice sized unfinished basement with a full-size washer and dryer (included with rental). This home is just steps from Rittenhouse Square restaurants, shops, fabulous nightlife, parking garages, public transportation and everything Center City has to offer. title: STUNNING, COMPLETELY RENOVATED 2 BEDROOM, 2 BATHROOM RESIDENCE!
description:
Stunning, completely renovated two bedroom, two bathroom residence located on the 19th floor of The Academy House along the Avenue of the Arts! Enter into the foyer with black tile floors and coat closet. The large eat-in kitchen has granite countertops, a peninsula, breakfast nook, modern wood cabinets, subway tile back splash and stainless steel appliances including a Frigidaire electric range, oven and microwave, a Kitchenaid refrigerator, and a Whirlpool dishwasher. The adjacent great room has hardwood floors and city views to the south and east from a private Juliet balcony which can be accessed from each room. The primary suite has great closet space and a spacious ensuite bathroom which features a shower/tub with subway tile and a double vanity. The second bedroom is spacious and also has a large amount of closet space. Directly across is the hall bathroom which has tile flooring, a contemporary glass vanity, and a shower/tub. There is a Maytag stackable washer/dryer in the unit. No detail was left undone in this showplace condominium. The terrace doors were pushed out to increase interior square footage. Residents of Academy House enjoy a 24-hour doorman and a state-of-the-art fitness and aquatic center. There is valet parking in the building's garage for an additional monthly fee, subject to availability. The Academy House is located in the heart of Center City and within close walking distance to Rittenhouse Square, Washington Square, and the Broad Street and Market Street office corridors. The Philadelphia International Airport and Amtrak's 30th Street Station are easily accessible.
1420 Locust St #19F

title: WELCOME TO BRIDGEVIEW! LOCATED IN BUSTLING OLD CITY!
description:
SHORT TERM 6 MONTH LEASE. Welcome to Bridgeview! Located in bustling Old City, on a quiet cobblestone street, is a renovated, top floor loft for you to call home. The building features high quality amenities including roof deck, garage parking, 24 hour concierge service, and a thriving association of owners. Your new home, unit 616, is bathed in natural light and features the high ceilings and exposed brick walls of your dreams. Enter the unit and find ample storage by the door before moving toward the kitchen, notice the hardwood floors throughout. You’ll first find an updated kitchen with a fresh new backsplash, stainless steel appliances and tons of storage. From here, you’ll enter the open living space with plenty of room for a dining table and living room set. Notice the size of these windows! You’ll find more closet storage on the way to the full bath that features stone tile and radiant heating in the floors. Next, is the large primary bedroom with two huge windows and more exposed brick. Another closet here for additional storage. Lastly you’ll find a BONUS room that is perfect for a nursery, home office, gym, dressing room, yoga room, guest bedroom or whatever you desire to make of it! Unit 616 comes with a 3x6 storage unit on the 6th floor (near the elevator and unit). GARAGE PARKING AVAILABLE FOR ADDITIONAL $250/ MO. Easy access to the Market Frankford Line, I-95 and the Ben Franklin Bridge make this a commuter's dream and on the evenings and weekends you are in the heart of everything that Old City has to offer including tons of boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants and museums. Don’t miss your opportunity to claim this stylish home for yourself!
315 New St #616

title: Wonderful 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath Townhouse With a Dedicated Parking Spot
description:
Wonderful 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath townhouse with a dedicated parking spot right in front of this house! Located in Logan Square, Nectarine Street is between 19th & 20th, Spring Garden and Hamilton Streets. Main Floor offers an open floor plan with a spacious dining room and living room with hardwood floors and a charming balcony/deck. Also on this floor is an exceptional kitchen with beautiful custom wood cabinetry and stainless steel appliances, and a modern half-bath and a laundry area. Upper level offers an amazing main bedroom with an upscale ensuite bathroom, a cathedral ceiling, huge closets, and the most beautiful natural light! There are also 2 more bedrooms with good closets and a fabulous hall bathroom. This townhouse has every amenity! Convenient to shopping, the Art Museum, and Fairmount Park. Available as of 12/1/22.
1924 Nectarine St

title: Enjoy the Conveniences of City Living from This Sunny 1-bed 1-bath Unt
description:
Enjoy the conveniences of city living from this sunny one bedroom, one bath unit in Society Hill Towers with all utilities included! Located on the 5th floor of the West Tower, this home features hardwood floors, walls of oversized windows, and beautiful treetop views. The kitchen is opened up to the living and dining area and features a convenient breakfast bar, gas range, dishwasher and full-sized refrigerator. A spacious bedroom features an oversized closet, and additional closets off the entryway and hall provide great storage space. Part of the I.M. Pei-designed Society Hill Towers, this home is in an esteemed condo community featuring a 24 hr front desk, renovated common lobby, laundry facilities, and guest parking lot (w/hourly metered parking). The gym, seasonal pool, and garage parking are available to residents at an additional monthly cost. Perfectly located in the heart of historic Society Hill, this home is steps away from Zahav, Ritz 5 theater, ACME, Independence Hall, Penn's Landing, Headhouse Square, and convenient to public transportation and major thoroughfares. Monthly rent includes all basic utilities (electric, gas, water, heating and cooling) with internet/cable at an additional $64.00/m.

title: WELCOME TO UNIT 15A IN THE FABULOUS ELLINGTON BUILDING!
description:
Welcome to Unit 15A in the fabulous Ellington building! Unit 15A is a light-filled, south facing corner unit in one of the more spacious layouts of the building. High up on the 15th floor, you have views of South Philadelphia as well as the iconic Comcast building! High ceilings and oversized windows make for a comfortable living & dining space. The kitchen has plenty of cabinet and counter space plus stainless steel appliances. Storage is not an issue in this unit - the hall is lined with deep closets for all of your belongings and both bedrooms have ample closet space. The primary bedroom is complete with an en-suite bathroom. Stackable washer/dryer is located right off the kitchen. The Ellington is a secure, convenient building with a 24-hour concierge, fitness center, meeting & party rooms, and a library. Several parking garages with monthly options are within a block of the front door. No pets. First, last, and security deposit due prior to move-in. $300 non-refundable move-in fee required by the building. All utilities included except cable/internet.

show contact info
About the Royal Tahitian:
"These 1,551 sq. ft. suites accommodate up to eight guests. You get all the luxuries as these units consist of the Moorea and Bora Bora units connected as one single suite. There is a king size bed in the two separate bedrooms, a sleeper sofa in the two living room areas, two showers one of which is a steam shower, a kitchenette, a fully equipped full size kitchen, and a jetted tub in the master bedroom.
No island-themed getaway would be complete without a proper pool complex and Tahiti Village has one of the most impressive in Las
Vegas. Featuring million gallons of water, a mile lazy river and a sandy beach entry, this palm tree and Palapas-surrounded oasis is the perfect spot to basque in the sun or unwind into the evening. During the summer, Tahiti Village hosts on-site luaus complete with live entertainment, specialty cocktails and traditional island fare.
In addition to our massive outdoor recreational spaces, Tahiti Village offers meeting and event spaces perfect for your next family
celebration or corporate retreat. Our dedicated concierge team can help plan your special occasion.
For those looking for a little extra pampering, our Mahana Spa provides rejuvenating treatments using exclusively Pure Fiji products containing only natural ingredients.
After a day in the sun, you're sure to work up an appetite. Tahiti Village offers two seated dining experiences on property with a Denny's and our very own 17 South Booze & Bites, a laid-back pub featuring finely crafted bar food favorites and a choice selection of beers that is inspired by the Tahitian Islands that are located 17 degrees south of the equator.
To round out the Tahiti Village experience, our Bora Bora and Royal Tahitian suites feature stackable laundry and all of our rooms are equipped with either a kitchenette or full kitchen, perfect for preparing a nourishing meal on your trip. And for guests looking to stay in shape on the go, our fully equipped fitness center is open 24 hours a day.

title: Seasonal Bike Share Program, Beautiful courtyards, New fitness center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
